errors.name: InvalidBackpackEmergencyThreshold
errors.msg: Invalid backpack emergency multisig: must be 1/1

errors.name: InvalidBackpackEmergencySigner
errors.msg: Invalid backpack emergency multisig: incorrect signer

errors.name: InvalidBackpackEmergencyAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid backpack emergency multisig: has config authority

errors.name: UserRecoveryTimeLockTooShort
errors.msg: User recovery timelock must be at least 7 days

errors.name: BackpackRecoveryTimeLockTooShort
errors.msg: Backpack recovery timelock must be at least 7 days after user recovery

errors.name: BackpackEmergencyTimeLockTooShort
errors.msg: Backpack emergency timelock must be at least equal to backpack recovery

errors.name: InvalidBackpackEmergencyTransactionIndex
errors.msg: Invalid backpack emergency multisig: has existing transactions

errors.name: InvalidBackpackEmergencyStaleIndex
errors.msg: Invalid backpack emergency multisig: has stale transactions
